garter panels in pattern underarm sts pick up and knit 3 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 shift bor remove the cb marker knit to the 5 5 6 6 6 7 8 8 9 10 11 sts first raglan marker stop proceed to separate knit around round on the separation round that follows body and 40 44 46 50 52 56 64 70 72 76 78 84 90 96 sleeves will be separated sleeve sts are placed 106 114 120 126 132 sts on hold on waste yarn keep bor marker in throughout the sleeve until the cuff continue place all other markers can be removed the garter panel as established separation round place the 34 38 40 42 44 48 54 60 62 66 66 72 78 82 90
